basic.description:
Topics include: neuropsychopharmacology, cardiovascular pharmacology, agents acting on the endocrine system, and chemotherapy. 
NOTE    This course involves team based learning sessions and a drug literature evaluation assignment.
basic.subject: PHAR
basic.title: Principles of General Pharmacology II

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    PHAR 340/3.0 and Level 4 and (registration in a LISC Major or Specialization Plan) and (a GPA of 2.5).
